home.about_temple_title: Welcome to Shree Premdasbapa Godadiya Ramwadi Aashram
home.about_temple: This Hanumanji temple is considered most holy and sacred and It is among the most prominent ones in the Godadiya Parampara. The temple place was mere a jungle at the times when Samarth Shree Premdasbapa came here. They started their Spiritual practices and Bhajan Sankirtan at this place. The image of this temple is so powerful that mere darshan of this temple halps you to gain Peace of mind, Happiness, Joyfulness and helps to fulfill whishes and gives immense positivity.
home.about_sundarkand: The original Sundara Kanda is in Sanskrit and was composed by Valmiki, who was the first to scripturally record the Ramayana. Sundara Kanda is the only chapter of the Ramayana in which the hero is not Rama, but rather Hanuman. The work depicts the adventures of Hanuman and his selflessness, strength, and devotion to Rama are emphasized in the text. Hanuman was fondly called “Sundara” by his mother Anjani and Sage Valmiki chose this name over others as the Sundara Kanda is about Hanuman's journey to Lanka.

section1.title: Shree Premdasbapa Godadiya Ashram - Ramwadi, Karjan
section1.value: Located in the spiritually rich town of Karjan, Gujarat, Ramwadi Ashram serves as a beacon of faith, devotion, and community service. Established with the divine guidance of Shree Premdasbapa, the ashram welcomes devotees seeking peace, wisdom, and spiritual growth. Through its various activities, it fosters a deep connection between individuals and their faith, making it a sacred space for meditation, reflection, and service

section2.title: Our Heritage & Teachings
section2.value: The ashram is rooted in the teachings of Shree Premdasbapa, who emphasized the importance of devotion, selfless service, and spiritual wisdom. His philosophy inspires followers to lead a life of righteousness, charity, and inner peace. The ashram continues his legacy through regular religious gatherings, discourses, and communal service.

section3.title: Spiritual Gatherings & Activities
section3.value1: At Ramwadi Ashram, daily prayers, bhajan sessions, and satsangs are held, where devotees come together to sing hymns, chant mantras, and reflect on divine teachings. These gatherings create a blissful atmosphere filled with devotion and spiritual energy, helping individuals find solace and strength in their faith.
section3.value2: Special events and festivals are celebrated with great enthusiasm, bringing together devotees from various communities to partake in rituals, discourses, and service programs. These occasions not only strengthen spiritual bonds but also uphold traditions and values passed down through generations.

section4.title: Meditation & Spiritual Growth
section4.value: For those seeking tranquility and inner awakening, the ashram offers a peaceful space for meditation and reflection. Visitors often engage in silent contemplation, allowing them to reconnect with their inner selves, reduce stress, and attain mental clarity. Guided meditation sessions are sometimes conducted to help newcomers embrace the practice of mindfulness and spiritual awareness.

section5.title: Gaushala: Care for Sacred Cows
section5.value: One of the ashram’s remarkable features is its Gaushala, where cows are lovingly cared for with devotion and compassion. In Hindu tradition, cows are considered sacred and symbolically connected to prosperity and divine blessings. At Ramwadi Ashram, the Gaushala stands as a testament to selfless service and reverence for all living beings. Devotees actively engage in feeding, nurturing, and protecting the cows, reinforcing values of kindness and responsibility toward nature.

section6.title: Community Service & Welfare
section6.value: Ramwadi Ashram is deeply committed to seva (selfless service), conducting various social welfare initiatives. Activities such as food distribution, charity work, and support for underprivileged communities are regularly organized to uplift and assist those in need. The ashram welcomes volunteers and devotees to contribute through service, making a meaningful impact on society while nurturing a spirit of generosity.

section7.title: Welcoming All with Open Arms
section7.value: Ramwadi Ashram is more than just a place of worship—it is a spiritual home where faith meets service. Whether you are seeking divine wisdom, peace of mind, or an opportunity to give back to society, the ashram invites all devotees and visitors with warmth and open-hearted hospitality.

donation.support_us_para1: At Shree Premdasbapa Godadiya Ashram – Ramwadi, Karjan, your generous donations help us carry forward a sacred mission rooted in faith, service, and community upliftment. With your support, we organize spiritual activities like Sundarkand Path, Hanumanji and Mahadev Pujas, and grand Kathas by revered speakers; care for cows in our Gaushala with devotion; conduct free food distribution (Sadavrat) thrice a week; and actively engage in temple and ashram development. We also encourage spiritual values in the younger generation by inviting students from various schools to participate in devotional singing and speeches, rewarding them and offering prasad.
donation.support_us_para2: Every Hindu festival — from Ram Navami and Janmashtami to Hanuman Jayanti, Guru Purnima, Purnima events, and Shravan Sundays—is celebrated with Annadan and Bhandara. Each rupee you offer becomes a part of this divine cycle of devotion, dharma, and seva.
